subject: Mathematics
question_text: Given below are two statements : One is labelled as Assertion (A) and the other is labelled as Reason (R) . Reason (R) : Enthalpy of neutralisation is the amount of heat liberated when one mole of ions furnished by acid combine with one mole of ions furnished by base to form one mole of water.
